Game: Imagine- Cheerleader Show Your School Spirit by Becoming a Cheerleader! Make a difference for your school and friends by leading the team to victory! Use the stylus to perform different cheers, kicks, lifts, and a variety of routines that will get the crowds pumping and inspire your team!
